body: I am anxious to see how this turns out.
The story is very getting more interesting 🔥🔥🔥
He's turning into the King of Currumpaw. This will be fucking magical.

Ok the story is getting interesting. Mc is slowly turning into a alpha wolf but hope he doesnt drive himself too much down into the dark path but enough to screw the rest of the characters who deserve that treatment
Idk but i like this story

I can tell this story is just manipulation cuck fest lol. Even the girl the dude thought is a saint probably just does it for her boyfriend or something. Well I hope not, because the other girls seem dangerous.
There needs to be some rimming, all that delicious ass and nobody is having a taste
If you are reading this comment your parents will die within 5 years. To undo this curse you need to copy this and paste it on 5 other manga. i'm so, so sorry,please forgive me

To whoever translated this (or at least left those side-notes): YOU. ARE. DUMB.
So the guy, stressed about being alienated on his job and under the influence of alcohol, gets a little touchy and, before going any further, snaps out of it and leaves... according to you, he's a rapist. Do you even read the thing you translate/edit or just look at the fucking pictures? Oh, the irony, you are just like his asshole co-workers.

(and yes, I just made an account to post this)
